name: Multi Turret Academy: Prologue
description:
Welcome, Comrade Commander!

Multi Turret Academy is a Top-Down tank shooter game with a little bit of Roguelike element.
In this game, you become a tank commander in a soviet academy, leading a group of students from tank club to participate in tank games.

Choose Tank

There are over 50 WWII tanks to choose from in the game. You can select one as your combat vehicle.


Modify Tank

During playthrough, you can freely dismantle turrets from your tank and replace it with the turrets from other vehicles.


Recruit Crews

Each student in the tank club has unique talents. Recruiting them into your crew during battles will grant your vehicle new abilities.


Join the Discord to participate in the development of this game!

This is my first game. If you have any suggestions or feedback, feel free to join the Discord and discuss with me.
